name: Little Red Riding Hood - A Different Tale
name_original: Little Red Riding Hood - A Different Tale
description:
When re-creating Little Red Riding Hood, the requirement were to, use three colors. Red, White, and Black. We had and option to do Gray as well. For the design wise for this intake, it was to have the mood set, as a grim and sliglity darker tone. I gave the trees some shadow, put some blood in the holes, as well as add some snow on for the stick/branches. After getting the feedback, that I was given by my classmates, it was very helpful you push the limits for what more I can add to a different ton for Little Red Riding Hood. I do wish I had more time to add more, but I did what I could.

MOVEMENT

Use the UP, DOWN, RIGHT, and LEFT ARROW KEYS to move
